attributes.action: The NHS belongs to us,and not to the politicians
attributes.additional_details:
The NHS was set up in 1948 to serve the needs of the British Public.Since the 1970 successive politicians have set out to destroy the great service,that irrespective of status it looked after you.

The current changes will allow privatization of services to the detriment of the patients that use the NHS.We the public want our NHS back.

This will set up new governing bodies in eah area, and there will be no cuts to any NHS service without a public vote.
